ai-patthana24.7:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.7:0.3_0: the color for the sake of self-defilements, etc., the six kinds of grasping -
ai-patthana24.7:1.1_0: for sake of grasping, or for the sake of grasping.
